content: Which American pop artist is known for his iconic depictions of Campbell's soup cans?

That would be Andy Warhol, one of the leading figures of the pop art movement in the 1960s. His series of Campbell's Soup Cans paintings are some of the most recognizable works of art in the world. Warhol's use of mass-produced images and his exploration of celebrity culture had a profound impact on the art world and popular culture as a whole.
